title: aboutus
html:
About Us

Kai Zhang

Hi, my name is Kai Zhang. I am currently a sophomore at Moreau Catholic High School in Hayward. I enjoy martial arts, coding, and math. I was responsible for creating a majority of the program and drafting most of the paper.

Max Zhang

My name is Max Zhang. I am a sophomore at Irvington High School in Fremont. My hobbies include playing badminton, coding, and drawing. I primarily contributed to the program development and assisted with writing the paper.

Vyom Kumar

Hi, Iâ€™m Vyom Kumar, a sophomore at Moreau Catholic High School in Hayward. I enjoy running, coding, chess, and math. My contributions include testing the project, recording data, and assisting with writing and formatting the paper.
